name: Marauder's Map
description: Magic parchment that reveals the current location of anyone on Hogwarts grounds
magicalProperties: Shows the location of any person or ghost on Hogwart’s grounds, isn’t fooled by an Animagus or an Invisibility Cloak
whoMadeOrFirstOwnedIt: The Marauders: Remus Lupin (‘Moony’), Peter Pettigrew (‘Wormtail’), Sirius Black (‘Padfoot’) and James Potter (‘Prongs’)
